### {{current_title}} COUNTY

* Total Polling Places: `r polling_places %>% filter(state == "Alabama", county_name == "{{current_title}}") %>% count()`
* Example Locations:

```{r}
polling_places %>% 
  filter(state == "Alabama", 
         county_name == "{{current_title}}") %>% 
  head(6) %>% 
  select(name, address.x) %>% 
  kbl(format = "markdown")
```
